description: Returns summaries of the organization's users.

parameters.name: OrganizationId
parameters.description: The identifier for the organization under which the users exist.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: Limit the user search results based on the filter criteria. You can only use one filter per request. UsernamePrefix (string) --- Filters only users with the provided username prefix. DisplayNamePrefix (string) --- Filters only users with the provided display name prefix. PrimaryEmailPrefix (string) --- Filters only users with the provided email prefix. State (string) --- Filters only users with the provided state. IdentityProviderUserIdPrefix (string) --- Filters only users with the ID from the IAM Identity Center.

nested_params.name: UsernamePrefix
nested_params.description: Filters only users with the provided username prefix.

nested_params.name: DisplayNamePrefix
nested_params.description: Filters only users with the provided display name prefix.

nested_params.name: PrimaryEmailPrefix
nested_params.description: Filters only users with the provided email prefix.

nested_params.name: State
nested_params.description: Filters only users with the provided state.

nested_params.name: IdentityProviderUserIdPrefix
nested_params.description: Filters only users with the ID from the IAM Identity Center.

nested_items.name: Users
nested_items.description: The overview of users for an organization.

nested_items.name: DisplayName
nested_items.description: The display name of the user.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the user, which can be ENABLED, DISABLED, or DELETED.

nested_items.name: EnabledDate
nested_items.description: The date indicating when the user was enabled for WorkMail use.

nested_items.name: DisabledDate
nested_items.description: The date indicating when the user was disabled from WorkMail use.

nested_items.name: IdentityProviderUserId
nested_items.description: User ID from the IAM Identity Center. If this parameter is empty it will be updated automatically when the user logs in for the first time to the mailbox associated with WorkMail.

nested_items.name: IdentityProviderIdentityStoreId
nested_items.description: Identity store ID from the IAM Identity Center. If this parameter is empty it will be updated automatically when the user logs in for the first time to the mailbox associated with WorkMail.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. This value is null when there are no more results to return.
